about_the_game:
All Racing game Enthusiasts and Thrill-seekers of the world!
It’s time for another adrenaline-pumping, awe-inspiring, hair-raising, and breathtaking Horse Racing game where you race against competitors. If you are afraid of impressive speeds, you’d better play another game. Horse Riding Rally - Free 3D Racing is the most realistic 3D Horse racing game. It's easy, exciting, fun, and highly addictive. Challenge yourself and see how much you can win!
It will give you an amazing horse racing experience. With lifelike horse animations, immersive graphics, addictive gameplay, and heated competition Horse Riding Rally is the must-have game for all ages. Have you got what it takes for this challenging experience?

It will give you an amazing horse racing experience. With lifelike horse animations, immersive graphics, addictive gameplay, and heated competition Horse Riding Rally is the must-have game for all ages. Have you got what it takes for this challenging experience?
developers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most recent version of Ubuntu LTS with the Unity, Gnome, or KDE desktops
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Horse Racing Rally

subs.option_text: Horse Racing Rally - Commercial License - $1.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: DX10 compatible or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited

With lifelike horse animations, immersive graphics, addictive gameplay, and heated competition Horse Riding Rally is the must-have game for all ages. Have you got what it takes for this challenging experience?
